amendment.description: Amendment sought to return the base coverage level for insurance on deposits to the current $100,000 level by removing provisions increasing coverage to $130,000, as well as provisions to automatically increase coverage through inflation adjustments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ose amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Ose.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ose amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
